name: Don Tomas - Maduro - Robusto
additionalNotes: Don Tomas has long been manufactured in Honduras, and today it is one of the standards of a well-made Honduran handmade. Wrapped in a bold Connecticut Broadleaf overtop Connecticut Maduro binder and Dominican and Nicaraguan long-fillers, Don Tomas delivers tons of flavor without ever overwhelming. Toasting the foot, you'll find tons of charred wood, chocolate, black pepper, and a backing of natural tobacco sweetness - a combination that practically begs to be paired up with a few fingers of the good stuff.
